item.description:
Hi everyone,

I'm very excited to share a special opportunity with you. Caroline Myss, New York Times bestselling author and renowned medical intuitive and spiritual leader, will be offering a presentation through The Graduate Institute on Friday, December 3rd at 7 pm. I'm sure many of you know of Caroline and have read her work, and this is a rare chance to see her live and experience her wisdom, energy, and persona firs hand!

Tickets are $40 and pre-registration is required (once you reserve your spot you will be added to a reservation list and you can check in at the door). There are a limited number of seats available and tickets will be sold on a first-come, first-serve basis!

I hope you can make it, as this is bound to be an uplifting and joyful celebration of health, wellness, and the power of human consciousness.

To reserve your space, please visit www.learn.edu/myss
item.name: An Evening with Caroline Myss
